[[Image:Ad-aware 2007 screenshot.png|thumb|right|200px|Ad-aware 2007]]
'''Ad-Aware''' is an anti-spyware program developed by [[Lavasoft]] that detects and removes [[spyware]] or [[adware]] on a user's computer. It also detects [[dialer]]s, [[Trojan horse (computing)|Trojans]], [[malware]], viruses, bots, rootkits, [[data-mining]], aggressive advertising, parasites, [[browser hijacker]]s and tracking components.
'''Ad-Aware''' is an anti-spyware program developed by [[Lavasoft]] that detects and removes [[spyware]] or [[adware]] on a user's computer. It also detects [[dialer]]s, [[Trojan horse (computing)|Trojans]], [[malware]], viruses, bots, rootkits, [[data-mining]], aggressive advertising, parasites, [[browser hijacker]]s and tracking components.
